EmailTemplate.description: DNBI Credit Information Update for Contract
EmailTemplate.name: DNBI Credit Information Update for Contract
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Application Status Update for {!Contract.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A Credit Decision has been updated on {!Contract.Account} for credit application {!Contract.DNBI__DnB_Application_ID__c}. Please review the updated credit decision.Click to view the record. Note: You can search the credit application ID in the main search box on Salesforce.com
